title: Orbea intro the Rise Hydro – a 19kg 140mm travel aluminium eMTB
content:
Orbea has swapped out carbon for alloy, introducing a class-leading lightweight aluminium eMTB in the form of the Orbea Rise Hydro. Taking the same reduced torque Shimano EP8 RS motor seen on the Rise Carbon, Orbea has looked to replicate that reduced-assist, lightweight ride experience, distilling it into a three-strong range of more affordable aluminium

The post Orbea intro the Rise Hydro – a 19kg 140mm travel aluminium eMTB appeared first on Bikerumor.
